title: Xbox console- weekly or monthly wipe servers?
selftext:
Morning rust players!
So I’m new to the game. My first 2 weeks on the console on a monthly wipe sever. Me and 2 friends. Decent base, not been touched, crates filled with guns, metal armour. We feel like we’re pretty solid for the next 2 weeks till wipe. Which makes me think is monthly too long? Like since it’s console as well, there isn’t much else to do other than raid bases with not that much to gain from them since they’re mostly lower tier. Also, I realised with weekly wipes the map changes every wipe, so more frequent challenge on that aspect.

Just thought I’d get some opinions on this from some experienced rust players since I’m only 2 weeks old for this game. Weekly or monthly and why?

Thank you in advance!
